column2: Break Free from the Great Beastlord.
You can declare war against the §YGreat Beastlord§! to free yourself from your status as a §YTributary§!
Claim the title of Great Beastlord through combat.
You can declare war on the §YGreat Beastlord§! to claim his titles and take his place
Has provinces in the §YChaos Wastes region§!.
Borders the realm of the §YGreat Beastlord§!
Peace Deal with the Brayherds
War With the Brayherds
Exceptional Bray
Great Bray
Heart of the Dark
Realm of the Brayherds
Bray
Summon Bestigor
Use your favour to enlist a Beastman Champion.
Summon Bray Shaman
Use your favour to enlist a wizened Bray-Shaman.
Favour of Chaos Gods
Sacrifice your favour with the chaos gods in exchange for ruinous gifts. However, there is a chance that the gods will take no notice and nothing will happen.
Daemonic Artifact
Use your favour to request an artifact, gifted by the Ruinous Powers
Summon a Brayherd
Use your favour amongst the herds to summon together a Brayherd to fight for you.
Is at peace with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!
Request an Exceptional Bray
Use your Favour to get one of the fine brays held by the [brayherd_warp.governor.GetName].
Go on a Pilgrimage
Go on a Pilgrimage into the Heart of the Dark.
Offering to Ruinous Powers
Offer your wealth to gain the favour of the Ruinous Powers.
Offer Artifact to Ruinous Powers
Offer an Artifact to gain the favour of the Ruinous Powers
Sacrifice to the Ruinous Powers
Offer a worthy sacrifice to gain the favour of the Ruinous Powers.
A request from a Beastlord has arrived to ask for a bray of stature.
Offer him one of my own breed
Just get him one of the pretty ones

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting].\n\nThe Ruinous Powers has decided to answer the tribe of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] the honor. [From.GetHerHisCap] daughter, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetCathayanComplimentAdjective] Bray [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the bride of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting].\n\nThe Ruinous Powers has decided to answer the tribe of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] the honor. [From.GetHerHisCap] daughter, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetCathayanComplimentAdjective] Bray [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the bride of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].
Ah finally, a lovely addition to the Collection!

Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the stunning bray, [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCathayanComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the silk banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\nIt is no mere [From.GetManWoman] who steps down from the litter, but a creature of pure, ethereal grace. [From.GetSheHeCap] does not walk across the courtyard to meet you – [From.GetSheHe] glides. Awe mingles with a tiny sliver of dread as you look upon [From.GetHerHis] emotionless face. How has a [Root.GetManWoman] like you come to deserve such a noble [From.GetBrideGroom]?
A Ruinous Union
The Great Beast

Traveling the Dark forest, you encounter a battlefield filled with corpses of human soldiers. Judging from the monstrous wounds across their bodies, there is no doubt it is the work of a Jabberslythe - a big one. Surely it would please the dark gods to slay such a great beast?
I must catch it's trail immideatly!
It's probably long gone already

Scouring the dark forest for your prey, you come upon a lone bestigor. As you strike up conversation, it turns out he also hunts the same great Jabberslythe that you are after. His lack of success thus far seems to match yours, but he invites you to talk and share experiences.
After many days of hard hunting and tracking, you have finally managed to trap the Jabberslythe in a forest clearing. The great beast is at your mercy - it notices you. It is time to act...
I must flee before it catches me.
Time to close in and hope it doesn't run.
To the Heart of The Dark
The Journey to visit the Great Herdstone §MHeart of the Dark§! can be ardous and it takes months to travel the beastpath. I take my farewells to my near and dear and prepare my retinue for departure.
Let's get going!
Our company has finally reached the site of the Heart of the Dark. You can already see the malignant powers of it resonating from the distance.
Let us walk, lest i forget about the reason for the journey.
Wandering the site, i come across a ring surrounding a couple of fellow bestigors. They are fighting in a bloodied brawl. Perhaps i could also partake in this, or maybe make some profit...
Let me show you how it's done.
column4: Lasst mich Euch zeigen, wie das geht.
column6: Os voy a enseñar cómo se hace.

column2: 'Could i try aswell?'
Wouldn't hurt to bet for a winner i suppose.
You find a few odd bestigors, worshipping a single Chaos god upon defouled altars.
Study their rituals from a distance.
Join in on their ceremony.
Criticize their favouring of a single Chaos god.
Study the symbolism used in their texts.
It's time to see and perform my sacrifices at the Great Herdstone.

'The [brayherd_warp.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has kept [brayherd_warp.Ruler.GetHerHis] eyes on you', the Chief Minister says. 'You may enter the throne room to show your subordination, but be quick about it'.
You have entered the vicinity of the Great Herdstone of Heart of the Dark, and you are feeling it's malignant presence, filling you with thoughts of the Ruinous Powers.
Humble yourself before the Great Herdstone.
Refuse this humiliation and storm out of the Site
column3: Refuser cette humiliation et sortir de la pièce.
column4: Lehnt die Erniedrigung ab und stürmt aus dem Raum.
column6: Estallas, negándote a esta humillación y abandonas la sala.

column2: Take in the Energies of the Great Herdstone
column3: Se prosterner hâtivement devant l'[brayherd_warp.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] silencieu[brayherd_warp.Ruler.GetXSe].
column4: Führt schnell das Kotau vor [brayherd_warp.Ruler.Getdemder] stillen [brayherd_warp.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] aus.
column6: Te inclinas apresuradamente ante un/a [brayherd_warp.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] en silencio.

column2: I'm invigorated by the Herdstone!

Me and couple of my clansmen have been making our way through a bustling encampment this morning. There is an ample supply of every meat, slaves, weapons and armour around...! Here and there we encounter warriors, along with dignitaries from other foreign herds. There is clearly no shortage of activity here.
Mhrrr Fresh Meat...?
You eagerly partake in the eating contest.\n
You there, let's barter.
You offer your patronage to the traveling bray-shaman, allowing you to bring home a §KBeastman Artifact§!!...!\n
Brethren... You keep that shaman occupied...
You proceed to steal from one of the local shamans, allowing you to bring home a §KBeastman Artifact§!...!\n
I think I've had enough for one day.

An ungor messenger approached your retinue from the camp of [target_host.GetBestName]. [target_host.GetFirstName] has heard of my travels and invites our party to parlay in his tribe's encampment for a while in the warmth of the [target_host.GetCapitalHolding] [target_host.Capital.Capital.GetName].
This could prove a valuable opportunity. Kill the messenger...
You utilize your rival's hospitality to set up a risky murder attempt on them.
A moment's respire and a hot meal is most welcome. Now, to kill the messenger....
Is my old rival really prepared to bury the hatchet?
You accept the invitation to the camp of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName].
No Resting for the wicked. Proceed to kill the messenger....

A warm hearth and healthy meals has invigorated the whole company, but after enjoying the hospitality of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] for some days it's now time to get moving on our path towards [brayherd_warp.GetName] again.

The previous days have certainly been a delight. I never imagined that we could have so many things in common. It is with regret that I bid farewell to [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] and we decide to move on towards our goal of [brayherd_warp.GetName].

We are presented with a deliciously looking meal, when [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] raises [target_host.GetHerHis] chalice to honor us with a toast. Longing for a good drink I take a big gulp before I notice that [target_host.GetFirstName] turns [target_host.GetHerHis] chalice upside down emptying it's content on the floor, laughing manically.
Thank you for being an amicable host.
Let's keep in touch.
Thank you, but we need to be on our way.
No, you! You...
Regaining my conciousness I find myself in the ditch to the side of the road. In my pocket I discover a letter with the firmest handwriting reading 'This is your last warning, stay out of here!'.
I have a terrible ache in my whole body.
[From.Get}displeased
[From.Get}displeased
